title: LAMBDA: Learning, Applying, Multiplying Big Data Analytics

author: Hajira Jabeen, Department of Computer Science, Bonn-Rhine-Sieg University of Applied Sciences

segmentation: So hello everyone, my name is hard trying.
I'm presenting here Project Lambda that is about learning, applying, multiplying big data analytics.
So this is funded by research and innovation action of Horizonte 2020, and the main idea behind the project is research excellence and widening participation.
So the main idea is strengthening a defined field of research in widening countries.
For example, West Balkan area in countries, European countries and selecting a Research Institute from there and advance their expertise.

So the key pillars of the project are learning and open education, applying knowledge and cooperation, multiplying the area of big data and analytics, dissemination an outreach of the knowledge that is disseminated, an assisted sustainability development of this knowledge areas.
